import React from 'react' import {ChakraProvider, Container, Box, Stack, Image, Heading, Text, Link} from '@chakra-ui/react'; import './Nyoba.css'; const Section4 = () => { return ( ZEN shopping Mastercard® You shouldn’t be bound to use one card at a time,
especially when it has so many benefits! With ZEN, you can manage your shopping and finances with both physical and
virtual cards. It’s convenient, streamlined, and works like a
charm. You can have a shopping card, a subscription card,
and whatever other cards that make sense to you. ) } export default Section4
